content: ä»£ç  #include<bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std; #define endl '\n' #define x first #define y second typedef pair<int,int> Pii; const int maxn=2e5+5; int n,m,rk[maxn]; vector<Pii> e; void init(){} vector<int> g[maxn]; vector<int> topo; int vis[maxn]; bool dfs(int u){ vis[u]=-1; for(auto v:g[u]){ if(vis[v]<0)return 0; else if(!vis[v]&&!dfs(v))return 0; } vis[u]=1; topo.push_back(u); return 1; } bool toposort(){ topo.clear(); for(int i=0;i<=n;i++)vis[i]=0; for(int u=1;u<=n;u++){ if(!vis[u]&&!dfs(u))return 0; } reverse(topo.begin(),topo.end()); return 1; } inline void solve(){ cin>>n>>m; for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){ vis[i]=0; g[i].clear(); } e.clear(); for(int i=0;i<m;i++){ int u,v,w; cin>>w>>u>>v; if(w){ g[u].push_back(v); in[v]++; }else e.push_back({u,v}); } if(!toposort()){ cout<<"NO"<<endl; return ; } for(int i=0;i<topo.size();i++)rk[topo[i]]=i; cout<<"YES"<<endl; for(int u=1;u<=n;u++){ for(auto v:g[u])cout<<u<<" "<<v<<endl; } for(auto p:e){ if(rk[p.x]<rk[p.y])cout<<p.x<<" "<<p.y<<endl; else cout<<p.y<<" "<<p.x<<endl; } } int main(){ ios::sync_with_stdio(false); cin.tie(0); int __=1; cin>>__; while(__--){ solve(); } return 0; } #include<bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std; #define endl '\n' #define x first #define y second typedef pair<int,int> Pii; const int maxn=2e5+5; int n,m,rk[maxn]; vector<Pii> e; void init(){} vector<int> g[maxn]; vector<int> topo; int in[maxn]; bool toposort(){ topo.clear(); for(int u=1;u<=n;u++){ for(auto v:g[u])in[v]++; } int cnt=0; queue<int> q; for(int u=1;u<=n;u++)if(!in[u])q.push(u); while(q.size()){ int u=q.front(); q.pop(); cnt++; topo.push_back(u); for(auto v:g[u])if(!--in[v])q.push(v); } return cnt==n; } inline void solve(){ cin>>n>>m; for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){ in[i]=0; g[i].clear(); } e.clear(); for(int i=0;i<m;i++){ int u,v,w; cin>>w>>u>>v; if(w){ g[u].push_back(v); }else e.push_back({u,v}); } if(!toposort()){ cout<<"NO"<<endl; return ; } for(int i=0;i<topo.size();i++)rk[topo[i]]=i; cout<<"YES"<<endl; for(int u=1;u<=n;u++){ for(auto v:g[u])cout<<u<<" "<<v<<endl; } for(auto p:e){ if(rk[p.x]<rk[p.y])cout<<p.x<<" "<<p.y<<endl; else cout<<p.y<<" "<<p.x<<endl; } } int main(){ ios::sync_with_stdio(false); cin.tie(0); int __=1; cin>>__; while(__--){ solve(); } return 0; }
